author: esme_johnson
post: When Judah left his brothers he bore children with the Canaanites. The Canaanites were descended from Ham, widely accepted as the father of the black race. Jesus was a direct descendant of this union. So too when David begat Solomon with Bathsheba it is likely that he had a union with some one of Sheba, a name associated with the Ethiopians and descendants of Ham. It can easily be argued from Biblical evidence that Jesus was not of a pure race and of a black heritage..
